entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
